Family Dinners  Lunch  Braaied Mushroom and Fry’s Chicken Burger with Basil, Rocket Pesto and Pineapple.

Asian Fusion  Family Dinners  Lunch  Buddha Bowl with Chicken-Style Burgers & HummusLower your cholesterol and be kind to your heart with this nourishing Buddha bowl. Served with cholesterol-free oil-free hummus, wholesome veggies and Fry’s Chicken-Style burger, this heart-healthy recipe will leave you satisfied!
Family Dinners  Kids  Country Cauliflower Cottage PieA hearty and classic family dish with the addition of cauliflower through the creamy mash topping.
Family Dinners  Lunch  CHAKA-LEKKA Burger pie
Lunch  Chargrilled Sausage Paninis with Kale Pesto and Chili OilThe perfect veggie-loaded sandwich for your next braai or barbeque. Packed with dairy-free kale pesto, veggies, sausage and vegan cheese. Dip in some chili oil to add the perfect tangy kick to each bite.
Family Dinners  Lunch  Cheesy vegan nachos topped with nuggets and salsaCrunchy nachos topped with a warm creamy vegan cheese sauce, crunchy Chia Nuggets and fresh avocado, onions and chili.
Family Dinners  Lunch  Taste of India  Chicken-Style KadaiFry's Chicken-Style Strips tossed in a wok with curry leaves, coriander, turmeric, red chilli and mustard seeds. It sits on an aromatic South Indian tomato chutney and finished with fresh coriander leaves.
Asian Fusion  Family Dinners  Lunch  Chicken-Style Strips in Coconut, Orange and Ginger Cream SauceA mild, excitingly fresh and fragrant dish, we combine a medley of spices that blend together in this amazing version of a curry.
Family Dinners  Lunch  Taste of India  Chicken-Style Strips Kalya
Family Dinners  Chicken-Style Veg Pasta
Breakfast  Chipotle Mexican Breakfast Wraps with Avo Cashew Crema
Family Dinners  Classic sausage, white bean and vine tomato shepherd’s pie

Kids  Lunch  Starters  Crafted sausage on a stick in a cous cous and polenta herbed blanket
Family Dinners  Crafted smoked sausage, bean and olive casserole
Family Dinners  Creamy Vegan Chicken-Style StroganoffAn easy one-pot of creamy goodness made in minutes with our Chicken-Style Strips, mushrooms and classic herbs. Serve with your choice or either rice or noodles.
Family Dinners  Creamy Chicken-Style RavioliFry's Chicken-Style Strips and B-Well Tangy Mayo
